content: उर्वी {@--1@} ‘Wide region’, the earth; स्तोकमुर्व्यां प्रयाति <ls>Ś. 1. 7</ls>; जुगोप गोरूपधरामिवोर्वीं <ls>R. 2. 3</ls>, <ls n="R.">1. 14</ls>, <ls n="R. 1.">30</ls>, <ls n="R. 1.">75</ls>, <ls n="R.">2. 66</ls>; <ls>Me. 21.</ls> {@--2@} Land, soil. {@--3@} The open space or expanse (comprising six spaces; {%<ab>i. e.</ab>%} the four quarters of the sky with the upper and lower spaces). {@--4@} A river. {@--5@} (<ab>du.</ab>) <ab>Ved.</ab> the two worlds, or the heaven and earth.
